author: Nintendo of America
description:
The Pokémon Legends: Z-A game is available now, only on the Nintendo Switch 2 and Nintendo Switch systems.

https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/pokemon-legends-z-a-nintendo-switch-2-edition-switch-2/?utm_source=SW-AAA&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=S1004-01&utm_id=S1004-01

Get ready, Trainers—it’s time to embark on a city-wide adventure that’s all your own! Catch, battle, and train your Pokémon in real time by day, then duke it out with other Trainers to climb the ranks of the Z-A Royale at night. Plus, work with your allies on Team MZ to uncover the mystery behind the Rogue Mega-Evolved Pokémon and protect the peace in Lumiose City!

Nintendo Switch 2 players who have Pokémon Legends: Z-A on Nintendo Switch can upgrade to Nintendo Switch 2 Edition by purchasing the upgrade pack.

#NintendoSwitch2 #NintendoSwitch

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Follow Nintendo of America
X/Twitter: https:/
title: Pokémon Legends: Z-A – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition — Launch Trailer
